ing: 2 fresh pineapples, peeled, cored and cubed
des: "This is a refreshing summer cool off drink which is also great to serve at parties!  I serve mine with whipped cream on top!"
ins: Juice the pineapple, strawberries, and blueberries together in a juice machine.  Pour the juice into a blender along with the ice cubes.  Puree until smooth.
